snippet: Traders bid energy, airline and technology companies higher, with Apple rising as it announced new iPhone models....
abstract: Stocks drift as Nasdaq Composite Index reaches another record high.
lead_paragraph: Traders bid energy, airline and technology companies higher, with Apple rising as it announced new iPhone models.

headline.main: Wall St. Ends Mainly Unchanged, Though Oil Prices Rise
headline.print_headline: On a Day of Market Drift, the Nasdaq Manages to Set a Record
